title: Why should homework be banned or not? - Quora

It really depends upon the purpose of the homework. Should teachers avoid assigning homework for the sake of assigning homework? Yes, but there is a lot more to homework than just keeping students busy. Homework creates the opportunity to rehearse and review skills learned in classes. By completing additional practice, skills can gain fluency and schoolwork can get easier. Homework also doesn’t always mean completing things like worksheets. Some teachers flip their classes where the lecture is watched as a video for “homework” and the class time is used for discussion or practice. Some teachers require a specific amount of reading as part of homework to help build reading comprehension skills. Longer-term assignments bring with them a host of valuable skills to acquire such as time management and planning that are incredibly important to later success in life. Learning these skills in school when you can be supported by a teacher is important. With that said, homework needs to be intentionally assigned. Teachers need to think about why something is going home and how it will benefit instruction the next day. Homework needs to be able to be completed independently and have a feedback mechanism to ensure that mistakes get corrected.
